responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "05CDEA3C4F6C8D1E099910995A85F30E", "I\'m just a schoolgirl, really. Full of ideas, but afraid to go out and get them myself! Could you imagine scrambling to the top of that great heartwood in the harbor? Oh, but the branches are so brittle, so old. I\'ve stood on the walls of the fort, here and watched them snap and tumble in the wind. What I wouldn\'t do for a dozen or so of those fallen snags to study. Perhaps they retain some glimmer of their fabled magics.")
name: SQ_Lionhold_0002_Fragments_Carole_4_Response
